name: Mystic Dungeon (rudranshg)
description:
The game 'Mystery-Dungeon' is a two-dimensional dungeon crawler. Despite the fact that the gameplay is relatively basic, it nevertheless has aspects of mystery and a wide range of topics. The player finds himself in a mysterious location with zombies emerging from the locations where statues are guarded. To go further in the game, the player must fight the zombies and destroy the monuments in order to enter a magical realm with a variety of themes.

The game's ultimate goal is to achieve a high score. The game will continue until the player's health is completely depleted. The player possess a sword to defeat those zombies and break those statues, which can be upgraded on finding a powerup in those statues.

Controls -

Use Arrow Keys to move around the scene. Use the Spacebar to battle and destroy with the sword.

Have fun playing the game and exploring all of the themes it has.
